projects.title: Portfolio Site
projects.description:
A website to display my projects and experiment (you're currently here!).

Built using React, SCSS and MaterialUI components and hosted on Netlify.

 This site was designed as a fun project to test my skills and display my projects. I loved experimenting with various ways to display data and constantly fiddled with different ways to animate components to create a responsive and user-friendly site.

projects.title: Appointment Scheduler
projects.description:
Scheduler is a single-page react app with testing suite for managing booking reservations and timeslots through API calls. Features reactive UI with loading and error responses for intuitive user experience.

Features complete testing suite including storybook to test each react component individually and cypress to ensure end-to-end experience is functional.

projects.title: Product Pager
projects.description: Built using NextJS and Typescript react,

projects.title: Galaxy Seller
projects.description: A full-stack multipage app allowing users to log in and post items for sale. Features full CRUD functionality to the backend database and includes a messaging feature connecting users with an inbox of messages.

projects.title: Tweeter
projects.description: A singe-page twitter clone built using HTML and CSS. Jquery and AJAX were used to dynamically populate the sites data from the MongoDB backend server.

projects.title: TodoList
projects.description: A simple react app allowing users to add, sort and remove items from a list. Features local storage saving to maintain list data between sessions.

projects.title: TinyApp
projects.description: TinyApp is a full stack web application built with Node and Express that allows users to shorten long URLs and keep track of saved links. It has a fully functional register and login system with encrypted cookies and a hashed passwords. Uses an intuitive REST api and URL parameters for easy redirection of links.

games.title: War Tank
games.description:
A real-time multiplayer game running on Phaser3 and hosted on Heroku.
 Allows users to create real-time lobbies using generated codes and socket.io connections. 

Part of the final project for the lighthouse labs dev bootcamp.
games.details:
Using a code generator function from our backend server, users create lobbies that are identifiable by these unique IDs. The intention was to be able to quickly create a password protected lobby that can easily be shared for friends and famiies to join and play together.

 Some of the hardest logistical challenges came from integrating the websocket library into the phaser javascript game engine.

other.title: Java Homework App
other.description: A full stack desktop database app built using Java and SQL. Final project for Higher Level IB computer science

other.title: Discord Bot
other.description: A basic discord bot built to experiment with the discord API. Used to practice hosting a bot from a backend express server which would automate interactions from a third-party API.
